org.openbel.framework.common.cfg
Class RuntimeConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.openbel.framework.common.cfg.Configuration
      org.openbel.framework.common.cfg.RuntimeConfiguration
Direct Known Subclasses:
PhaseFourOptions, PhaseOneOptions, PhaseThreeOptions, PhaseTwoOptions
public abstract class RuntimeConfiguration
extends Configuration

Provides a base class for runtime configuration capabilities.

Two types of configuration exist within the BEL framework, runtime configuration and system configuration. Runtime configuration allows access and modification of settings that affect application behavior during runtime.

Constructor Detail

RuntimeConfiguration

public RuntimeConfiguration()
                     throws IOException
Creates a runtime configuration instance.

The configuration file to be used is the first file found while checking each PathConstants.RC_PATHS / PathConstants.RC_FILENAMES combination. If no runtime configuration file is found, it will be null.

Throws:
IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurs
